thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hipster B&B in a good location
thread.title_full: Hipster B&B in a good location - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: PeteHala
title: Hipster B&B in a good location
text:
This is a hipster (I use the word as a positive) boutique B&B. It's a number of buildings in the old Hutung slum area which have been sympathetically converted into a clean, modern small B&B. the room was a bit small but otherwise perfectly acceptable.
The neighbourhood itself is very interesting - part of the disappearing China; there are still communal washhouses in the area. That said the area is very clean & feels very safe if you ignore people riding electric bikes with no lights at night. Also convenient for local amenities such as the bars & restaurants around Qianhai Lake.
